            The Hidden History of Joshua Tree National Park    

UCR Magazine Spring 2023 ›








































 

Bold Hearts. Brilliant Minds.
At UC Riverside you won’t just take classes—you’ll take action. Powered by a great education, world-leading research, and knowledge-driven impact, our students are transforming the nation and the world. Because at UCR, we are a tapestry of trailblazers—from first generation students to globally recognized researchers—bringing together fluency of thinking that accelerates bold solutions and transforms lives.
Learn More about UC Riverside

NEWS














April 26, 2023


      Australian fossil goldmine opens permanently
    

      

  


  Land where a UC Riverside paleontology professor unearthed whole communities of Earth’s oldest animals is opening today to the public as a new national park in the Australian Outback. 
    

Read More »









April 25, 2023


      Forced water-use cuts made California more waterwise
    

      

  


  Water use ticked up in California after the state lifted mandatory water-use cuts, but not levels before 2013 because of increased water efficiencies.
    

Read More »

Explore UC Riverside
Take a tour of the UCR campus and get an inside look from anywhere in the world.
Campus Tour  Virtual Tour





























The Road to Coachella
Since third grade, Rafael Lopez ’07, aka Alf Alpha, had a deep love for Volkswagen buses because they made people smile. Combine that love and aspiration for music, and you get a boombox on wheels. Beating the odds and losing his mom at the age of eighteen, Lopez knew he wanted to fulfill his moms dreams for him and go to UC Riverside. Making music was his spiritual and therapeutic outlet during this time while he attended school. His dream was to share the love his mom gave him to the world and channel that through music. As a past Coachella artist, Lopez was the perfect alumnus to show Coachella goers and future students that UC Riverside is a place where you can live your dreams and build your full potential at full volume.
 Watch Video

Learn How Affordable a UCR Degree Can Be
Grants, scholarships, loans, and work study are offered to UC Riverside students, who receive some of the most generous financial aid packages in the nation. Business Insider ranked UCR No. 2 in the country for financial aid.

The Student Experience
At UCR, our strength lies in our diversity. You'll be joining a community of faculty and students from over 80 countries and countless cultural identities to exchange knowledge, build social mobility, and shape future leaders.
